title: Experimental and computational study on the effects of exhaust gas recirculation on thermodynamics, combustion and emission characteristics of a diesel pilot ignition natural gas engine
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00635F, Paper
Jun Shu, Jianqin Fu, Wenhui Yang, Jianxiang Huang, Tingpu He, Jingping Liu
This study investigates the impact of diesel pilot ignition (DPI) natural gas (NG) engines on combustion and emission characteristics across various exhaust gas recirculation (EGR) volumes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
